Key Match Events: The Suns came back from a 10-point deficit in the fourth quarter to win the game in overtime, 116-113.
Post-Match Reflections: John Voita, the Managing Editor of Bright Side of the Sun, expressed concern about the Suns' reliance on Kevin Durant in isolation playmaking situations.
Others: The Suns' final shot that forced overtime was a 15-footer by Kevin Durant, a breathtaking moment that showcased his greatness.
Others (continued): The Suns' best possessions at the end of the game were the ones in which Tyus Jones initiated the offense.
